Race.SpecificTitle: PW Senior Citizen Programs (Tax Renewal) -- 1.5 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Senior Citizen Programs Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Acadia, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a one and one-half (1-1/2) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation (an estimated $580,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) in the Parish for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2024, for the purpose of providing funds for services to the elderly, including the establishment and maintenance of centers for senior citizens?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Library (Tax Renewal) -- 4.25 Mills - PJ - 10 yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Acadia, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a four and twenty-five hundredths (4.25) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation (an estimated $1,618,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) within the Parish for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2024, for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating public libraries for the Parish?
